mapper.select: select id, pack_type as packType, upgrade_name as upgradeName, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, old_version as oldVersion, new_version as newVersion, size, md5_sum as md5Sum, memo, update_time as updateTime from bas_charger_upgrade_pack where id = #{id}

select count(id) from bas_charger_upgrade_pack
and upgrade_name LIKE concat('%', #{upgradeName}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into bas_charger_upgrade_pack(pack_type, upgrade_name, file_name, file_path, old_version, new_version, size, md5_sum, memo, update_time) values(#{packType}, #{upgradeName}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{oldVersion}, #{newVersion}, #{size}, #{md5Sum}, #{memo}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update bas_charger_upgrade_pack set pack_type = #{packType}, upgrade_name = #{upgradeName}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, old_version = #{oldVersion}, new_version = #{newVersion}, size = #{size}, md5_sum = #{md5Sum}, memo = #{memo}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
